import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = "im gonna woop yo ass"; }

Image to QR Code

Convert your logo to QR Code that would attract your customers! With just a little over 5 minutes learning curve you would become better than professionals to convert any image to a cool QR Code.
